name: Dory Blossom Salad
description: Indulge in a healthy and refreshing Dory Blossom Salad, perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet without compromising on flavor. This salad combines the succulence of cream dory with the crunch of fresh vegetables and the aromatic touch of basil, making it a must-try dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by washing all the vegetables - romaine, carrot, cucumber, yellow bell pepper, and green bell pepper. Pat them dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the romaine, peel and cut the carrot into thin slices, and thinly slice the cucumber, yellow bell pepper, and green bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the tomatoes and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the cream dory fillet with a pinch of salt and pepper, according to your taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and cook the cream dory fillet until golden and cooked through, about 4-5 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Let the fillet cool for a few minutes, then flake it using a fork.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the chopped romaine, sliced carrot, cucumber, bell peppers, diced tomatoes, flaked dory, and extra firm tofu (cut into cubes).
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle dried basil over the salad and gently toss to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the salad fresh and enjoy a burst of health in every bite.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
